data.title: College World Series winners by year: List of recent baseball national champions
data.meta_description: The annual Men's College World Series in Omaha, Neb. is one of the most popular events in college sports.
data.text:
The annual Men's College World Series in Omaha, Neb. is one of the most popular events in college sports, with fans from around the country traveling for baseball's national championship.

USC's 12 national titles are the most of any school, most recently back in 1998. LSU (7), Texas (6) and Arizona State (5) are the only other teams to win the College World Series at least five times.

The SEC has been dominant in recent years, and in 2024 will have its sixth national champion from the conference in the past seven editions of the College World Series.

College World Series winners by year list

Here's a look back at baseball's national champions from the past 25 years:

2023: LSU

2022: Ole Miss

2021: Mississippi State

2020: Canceled due to COVID

2019: Vanderbilt

2018: Oregon State

2017: Florida

2016: Coastal Carolina

2015: Virginia

2014: Vanderbilt

2013: UCLA

2012: Arizona

2011: South Carolina

2010: South Carolina

2009: LSU

2008: Fresno State

2007: Oregon State

2006: Oregon State

2005: Texas

2004: Cal State Fullerton

2003: Rice

2002: Texas

2001: Miami (Fla.)

2000: LSU

1999: Miami (Fla.)

Who won the 2023 College World Series?

LSU defeated Florida in three games to win the 2023 College World Series for the school's seventh national baseball championship.
